website_summaries.verdict: A 20g protein punch is packed within this soft, easy to chew bar, making it a good post-workout snack.
pros: Its soft texture is much easier to chew, something those with dental work, braces, or chewing issues will appreciate
Has a balanced flavor with very little aftertaste
High protein-to-carb ratio, and an added fiber boost
cons: The chocolate coating melts easily in warm temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Good bar for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Tasty bars I use as a breakfast replacement. They do give me pretty bad gas. This could be embarrassing, or hilarious depending on your situation. I work by myself mostly, and I don't mind sounding like an old Harley starting on a cold morning.
customer_reviews.author: mitsaru

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate food label
customer_reviews.text: Good enough flavor and ease of eating. A bit higher in sugar than preferred (10 g or less is better). Don't like that the product contains sugar alcohols, but Power Bar is not joining with the rest of the nutrition bar manufacturers and printing the grams of sugar alcohols in the nutrition facts section of the label. Instead, one must read through the ingredients to notice Maltitol syrup, which is a sugar alcohol. So beware, if you are sensitive to sugar alcohols, look elsewhere. Get with the labeling program, Power Bar!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bryant

customer_reviews.title: still good but, just as you wouldn't want chicken for ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to give a boost 10 or 15 minutes after eating one. Decent flavor and consistency. They don't crumble and make a mess as you bite into them. As stated they yield 20g of protein. I received a box of 15 and after eating one or two per day they're losing their appeal, still good but, just as you wouldn't want chicken for dinner every night, it's probably a good idea to have a few alternatives around and mix them up. I will order them again but I'll probably try a few others in the meantime. Overall a good deal as my price worked out to $1.16 per bar.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: NO ARTIFICIAL SWEETENERS
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY protein bars I will eat (and others made by PowerBar) for 2 reasons. First NO ARTIFICIAL SWEETENERS!!!! It is almost impossible to find protein bars these days that do not contain harmful ingredients like sucralose, stevia or HCFS. Second, it has a super high protein to calorie ration. (and they also taste great and fill you up)
customer_reviews.author: Richard Varno

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Tried cookies n cream... texture is soft, slightly grainy, but not too crumbly. The good: 20 gr of protein & protein to fat ratio. The bad & ugly: waaay too sweet! not necessary to pile all that sugar into a “healthy protein bar.” Only way I can finish the bar is by alternating each bite w/sips of bitter coffee. Beware, nutrition facts don’t list sugar alcohols, but ingredient list is packed w/them. This is why some people experience gastrointestinal side effects & discomfort. Please consider removing 50% of sugar content, it’ll improve taste & nutritional value 100%.
customer_reviews.author: NespulaNYC

customer_reviews.title: stale
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to up my game, as my health has been deteariating in my senior years. Will scratch this off my subscribe list, the product is stale, no flavor, like eating formed, sawdust. In my day's of limited mobility, it's difficult, if down right impossible, to step and get one of these nutrition bars, before wasting eighteen dollars on a box of these. During the war, Germany used to mix sawdust into the dough, to get more bread out to the troops. This is very similar.
customer_reviews.author: old shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best bars on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best bars on the market. They are soft, and moist, about the consistency of a milky way which is nice + they taste great and pack 20G. Everything else I've tried is like biting into a hard block of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor but...
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that the flavor of these bars are excellent. The problem I had with these bars may only affect some people. I tend to have problems with sugar alcohols which seem to cause bloating and nausea for me. I deliberately look for protein bars with this in them. These bars don't seem to have sugar alcohols (at least none are listed) but the caused the same bloating and nausea for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Matters
customer_reviews.text: I've tried almost all the flavors now and Chocolate Peanut Butter is by far the best. These PowerBars overall are a good deal, haven't found anything else yet that tastes at least decent, provides a great amount of protein, and isn't super expensive. The Chocolate Brownie flavor does provide 50% more protein, but that's actually because the bars are 50% larger! The Cookies & Cream flavor has an odd chemical taste to it. The Peanut Butter Cookie flavor is quite dry, and has less fiber than the others.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very pleased with the product. When I purchased these bars I compared them to other protein bars with similar macros and felt this was the better choice. The best part is powerbar is cheaper than, for example METrx meal replacement or OhYeah bars. The bar tasted like a lot of other bars, it was thick and chewy and the chocolate had a "waxy" texture (not messy though!) Taste kind of like cake actually just not as fluffy. No gritty or coarse textures like most protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Arina

customer_reviews.title: Powerbar changed this bar for the worse
customer_reviews.text: This bar has been changed. What happened to the taste & consistency? I order several boxes of these at a time on monthly shipment because they’re thick, tasty & have a great nutritional profile. I eat them every day for breakfast - they’re loaded with protein & keep my blood sugar stable. Power at please go back to the previous formulation. This new bland taste & chewy consistency is gross. And, the price has increased. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: S1

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I run my own business and sometimes things get chaotic....I ALWAYS keep meal bars in my bag so I've tried them all! These have 20g of protein which is HUGE, 20 is definitely going to curb hunger for a long time! They have a good flavor & texture, I would buy again and recommend to others. The only negative.....they are a bit dense so you'll want to take smaller bites or have a drink on hand.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is righton for chocolate & peanut butter, you feel as though you are eating a sinful candy bar instead of a protein bar. Will ALWAYS order them, my husband loves them especially and for a very ill man, he feels spoiled that I give him candy and not a nasty protein bar. "LOL" You have a GREAT company that tries (and succeeds) in helping your consumer not only ingest the protein that they have to have for whatever reason, but you make sure that they "enjoy" and look forward to eating it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: PowerBar, a long time fan of the original
customer_reviews.text: I have to state that this doesn't tast like a protein bar, it tastes like a candy bar. If you like peanut butter and chocolate, this is the one to eat! The only throw back, at least for me, is that it makes me gassy! I've never had a bar do that! Their original power bars were my go-to during my body building years with no problem, so this particular bar's effect is new to me. Flavor is great -- maybe your digestive system will handle it differently!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Family Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've eaten several different flavors of PowerBars over the years. While this is not necessarily my personal favorite, the rest of my family loved it. It does taste as expected, but the texture feels more gritty than other flavors. We use PowerBars as either meal replacements or a quick snack. My husband does a lot of field work, so this helps keep him going, when he can't stop to eat a meal. I like using them as travel snacks for myself and my son, when our food choices are limited on the road.
customer_reviews.author: AstraDaemon

customer_reviews.title: Good Bars!
customer_reviews.text: These are good. They do not taste too chalky or fake, but i AM familiar with this brand. they are cheep good nutrition protein bars. They are not top quality ingredients and are in no way the best tasting out there, BUT they are not bad by any means. Their price is perfect in comparison as well. I don't always reach for these but I will always have these on had for when i am on the go and want something sweet! The cookie crunch adds an extra dimension to this and they are true to flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the absolute best protein bar nutritionally, but for 20 grams of protein at 210 calories, it's really not that bad, and the flavor is actually really good. Maybe the SLIGHTEST hint of an after flavor that's a bit chalky, but it's really not bad, and not nearly as pronounced as many other brands. Solid grab-n-go protein bar for a super great price.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: I bought more
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I want a bit more of a peanut butter taste, and I wish it had I slight less carbs and cal. That being said these really do taste great, the texture is really good it has a very slight crunch in it. It's a mild taste all the way around, not overly sweet, does not seem to have a protein taste.
customer_reviews.author: SLewis

customer_reviews.title: Aftertaste that could kill a horse
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale for cheap and decided to give them a test. The aftertaste from the "peanut butter"y inner goo is horrendous. Compared to the Fit Crunch bars that I get from Costco, the Power Bar does not seem fit for human consumption. Even at three times the price, the $1 a bar Fit Crunch are definitely worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Artificial taste is a deal-breaker
customer_reviews.text: These are okay as far as protein bars go--but they have that artificial twang that I just can't get over. I switched to the ThinkThin high protein peanut butter bars. They don't have that weird twang but you do have to compromise a little on the macros (in a good way IMO). PowerBars have 30 fewer calories and 3g less fat, the same amount of protein (20g) but PowerBars have 12g of sugar and the ThinkThin bars have 0g sugar.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Filling but really sweet
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these bars to eat for breakfast on a backpacking trip. Initially I was delighted to find that they tasted just like cookie dough! The texture was nice and soft with no crunchies and the bar was easy to eat. After a few days of eating them, though, they became way too sweet and almost sickening. These might be better erved in smaller package sizes to not eat so many.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how artificial these are but they taste A++
customer_reviews.text: Hands down some of the best tasting bars and best value for the money, they taste like peanut butter candy bar, I did noticed some slight changes in taste, texture and even shape of the bar over the last few years but its not enough for me to rate them anything lower than 5 stars, if you are looking for basic great tasting protein bars give these (chocolate peanut butter) a try
customer_reviews.author: E. A.

customer_reviews.title: The best tasting protein bar for the macros
customer_reviews.text: What sets this bar apart from others is it's texture, namely it has texture as opposed to nearly all other protein bars that are like a gooey play dough. The center is slightly crunchy, airy and light, almost wafer like. What would make this bar even better is if it was all whey protein instead of a protein blend. Edit: Dropping 2 stars because they went from a protein blend to all soy protein. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: igs

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but a bit too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Usually cookies and cream tastes very artificial to me, but this doesn’t. It’s a a little heavy on the sugar than I prefer making it almost too sweet, similar to a candy bar. Husband loves these but the bars are smaller than what you find in a convenience store.
customer_reviews.author: amzingrl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if on sale, otherwise try other bars
customer_reviews.text: When I'm in a rush for a post workout meal, I like to go for a protein bar. Although PowerBar gives a decent amount of protein per serving, the carbs and fats are much higher than other comparable bars like Quest Bars and Luna Bars. If these fit your macros, only then would I recommend these. The bars do not have much texture other than being very thick as if you were eating Reese's Cups but in a big bar form. I got them for a good price so I wouldn't purchase again unless it was on sale.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good way to cut calories for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: So I know your mileage may vary with these types of products, but I've been trying to stay full in the morning because I got tired of eating lunch around 10:30 due to my appetite that can't be satisfied. I've found that eating one of these, along with 1-2 glasses of water, keeps me full until around lunch time! And the flavor's not half bad either.
customer_reviews.author: LI

customer_reviews.title: Taste GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I can NOT believe how great these taste! Almost like a REESES Candy cup!! I use bars daily as part of my diet plan,as meal replacements! I seriously love them! Price was also,very competative! Dont hesitate to buy them,you wont be sorry! Guaranteed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine B.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: PowerBar Protein Plus Chocolate Peanut Butter bars are delicious and super thick and they taste almost like a candy bar! I used to buy one of these bars at the convenience store before long bike rides, but it was so much cheaper to buy in bulk on Amazon. These bars taste great and give you that little push of energy you need for a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bar!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein bar of all time. I use these to cute my sweet tooth. The texture is on point and flavor is just like a Reese’s peanut butter cup. I know these have some sugar but still less than eating a candy bar and you get the benefit of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Coraline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality replacement for fan of the original Powerbars
customer_reviews.text: I was a fan of the original Powerbars that are no longer available. I recommend these as replacements. Easy to digest despite the higher protein content. A little crumbly compared to the originals and need to protect from heat such as a car in the summer - unlike the originals that would survive almost anything. Taste good as well. Recommend overall.
customer_reviews.author: dd1

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these, probably my favorite protein bar now.
customer_reviews.text: The cookie dough is incredibly tasty. Bars are about $1 each, which is a good value for protein bars. They keep me full for a bit. Only remotely negative thing I can think of is the sugar content. It's not too high, but it'd be nice if it were a bit lower.
customer_reviews.author: Jay_Cash

customer_reviews.title: It’s nothing like Reese’s but still tasty and packed with protein
customer_reviews.text: I eat these bars when I need something fast and easy and want some protein. They taste really good initially when I’m starving then my mouth gets kind of dry and I share a few bites with my kids. I like that they are convenient and I can bring them with me and how much protein they pack and who doesn’t like chocolate! My boyfriend loves Reese’s peanut butter cups but he’s a picky eater and won’t eat these at all, they just don’t taste similar.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Horrible delivery! No more OnTrac!
customer_reviews.text: This is what my husband found out on the driveway, not under the cover of the front door, with rain and snow coming in the forecast! I'm not sure about the clock I bought for a Christmas gift, hopefully it will still work. The bars for my husband are fine. We have wild life in the area we live in and we are fortune that a bear didn't get into this, that would have marked our home as a food source and then we would have a bear issue. This is absolutely the worst delivery service ever, no more Amazon orders with OnTrac delivery please.
customer_reviews.author: M-

customer_reviews.title: Very soft protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the protein bar to be as soft as it claims in the pictures. It's almost like eating cake. The cookies and cream flavor has bits of oreo-like cookie in it which is pretty neat! For less than a dollar per bar, it's such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kin L.

customer_reviews.title: It is delicious but can get boring quick and gasy
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first but now gota wait longer because the taste gets boring and it is good but in a weird protein way I just get bored and unexcited plus you do gota be hungry for it to help out. Not bad taste will do for price definitely does make me gasy though.
customer_reviews.author: Tespys

customer_reviews.title: Great taste with plenty of protein
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience and flavor of the PowerBar Protein Plus, Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars. I take one with me when I go to run errands because they easy to grab on my way out the door and provide the protein I need as I go about my day. I plan on trying other PowerBar products and flavors also because they are a much healthier choice than reaching for a candy bar and taste just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: This time delivery was not really good. The package was damaged and almost 50% of ...
customer_reviews.text: This time delivery was not really good. The package was damaged and almost 50% of the bars were flat... I dont care because ill ii anyway, but for someone it could be a really problem. Anyway next time im gonna order another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: favorite protein bar
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars. They are expensive in other packaging but cost effective when purchased via Prime Pantry
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Strickland

customer_reviews.title: My favorite breakfast bar!
customer_reviews.text: I dip this in my black coffee every morning. People who eat "real food" will complain that this isn't "real food". Health freaks will complain that this contains too much sugar. But for me personally, this is the perfect space between a muffin and an insidious glob of protein wrapped in fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Velvalee

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, value protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Powerbar has done a great job with their protein plus line which is why you will more often see it in stores compared to base power bars. The bars are very soft and chewy. Chocolate peanut butter is definitely the best flavor. The one catch is that it has more sugar than most bars, but still totally calories are reasonable at 210.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: taste is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The price for 12 is a better deal than most any on the market, so i tried them. they are not bad, but the texture is very much like many of the tofu products and not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Conley

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good, and I don't get sick of them ...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find protein bars that don't make you chunder. These are pretty good, and I don't get sick of them halfway through the bar. However, I have noticed that the chocolate layer on the outside doesn't hold up well to heat, so try to keep them from laying out in the sun. Otherwise, great energy bar
customer_reviews.author: DGG

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest protein bar I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a lunch meal replacement occasionally. Take with a full glass of liquid. These taste better and have a more solid mouth feel than any I have found at retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awesome but it would do a number on my stomach afterwards every time I ate it. That being said, I would recommend as a lot of times these protein bars have a nasty aftertaste but this did not.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in brown box.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was odd that it didn't come in a box, just as if they had bought it from the store and slapped a shipping label on it. The box is a little scratched up and damaged, but other than that looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great taste quality product!
customer_reviews.text: G8 product!! Great flavor, not heavy all No after-taste. Will buy more Advice Freezing them before a hike or trip so they are perfect when it come time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfrek

customer_reviews.title: Wow -- just discovered these
customer_reviews.text: I tried these for the first time yesterday and oh my gosh are they ever good! These are going to be a new favorite snack item at our house. We tried the vanilla ones. Those are okay, but these ones taste even better.
customer_reviews.author: S. McInnes

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, price good, too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: This bar is the exact opposite of my review for D's Naturals bars - the nutritional value is substantially lower than D's, but so is the price. They taste pretty darn good, but with 12 grams of sugar, they had better taste good! If not for the high sugar content, I would give these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F. Wilken

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Without too much of that chalky protein taste. Not too sweet, but still more of a dessert/snack than a savory meal replacement. I like them, and I’m picky!
customer_reviews.author: sophiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Candy Bars.
customer_reviews.text: They were onsale. They were good candy bars. Ye,s I said candy bars, because if you think they are anything but that you are fooling yourself. If you really need the protein have some bacon, it has less sugar and the mystery ingredient is bacon and not cancer.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeExample

customer_reviews.title: Just don't taste good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because there was a deal on them. I usually like the chocolate peanut butter PowrBars. These were nasty. I finished them, but I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: katie naas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars taste pretty good and have lots of protein. They are a little too much like a candy bar for my taste, I prefer ones that are more chewy. The texture was kinda like 3 musketeers bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Roop

customer_reviews.title: Just say No!
customer_reviews.text: These bars were a weird consistency and flavor and negativity reacted to my digestive system. In closer consideration, I realized the high content of sugar and gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bar and awesome protein
customer_reviews.text: There are tons of bars out there but this one is awesome. The peanut butter is smooth and the bar packs a good 20 grms of protein. This bar is great for a quick snack or after workout nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: JediG16

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good. It's hard to believe they're really healthy. They came in really good shape. I'm happy with the product and the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joyness60

customer_reviews.title: Yuck! One of the worst protien bars!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews...I thought I would give this bar a try. One of the worst protien bars I ever had. I normally can eat proteins bars or cookies with no issues. This one the other hand has won the battle. I will need to find someone to give this too.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: These were great at first
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first. They have a great macro-nutrient balance, and a little fiber to help things moving, but I realized they did not agree with my GI track. The sugar alcohol they use is gut wrenching. If you like spending a lot of time on the toilet feel free to consume these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Vanderbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good bar with no sugar alcohols.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are best when refrigerated. They are very light and have no artificial sweeteners. The calories are reasonable for a snack and the price on Amazon is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth texture and flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Another popular brand with similar nutritional content has had some manufacturing and/or recipe problems with this particular flavor in the last few months. I love chocolate peanut butter flavor in general, and I'm very glad I gave these a try. PowerBar brand has been a very welcome find for me.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very NICE
customer_reviews.text: Normally pay two dollars each for these at the retail store where I used to shop. These are wonderful meal replacements. They are tasty and filling, so you don't still feel hungry. The order arrived very quickly, early in fact. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LisaAnne Madden

customer_reviews.title: Best combo of yum/price. Healthier snack then cookie/candy etc. MACRO /diet doable, BUY IT! #GOAT
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Doesn't get ANY BETTER THEN THIS! BEST VALUE/TASTE COMBO! I BOUGHT2BOXES FOR $25, 30 OF EM!? #W1N #NOCOMPLAINTS #BESTVALUEperiod
customer_reviews.author: MR_COBRA

customer_reviews.title: Try a different flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tasted awful. Wish I could still find the classic chocolate performance bars. Although it tasted bad it seemed to provide the energy I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Family

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste, not bad with water. Not to happy with the amount of sugars. But then again I don’t eat one everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lawn nut

customer_reviews.title: Not very tasty and it has sugar alcohols
customer_reviews.text: These bars have a good macro ratio and they are ok if you are in bind. But they don't taste very good and they have sugar alcohols. The texture is soft and it tastes chalky and artificial.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein bar. PowerBar is by far my favorite brand when it comes to protein bars and this is my favorite flavor. Great taste and texture. No chalky, cardboard or artificial tastes that are normally associated with protein bars. Great for after a workout or as a meal replacement or snack. I would recommend this item to friends and family.

customer_reviews.title: Chalky
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is just ok, but it leaves a chalky residue in your throat, as if you are eating straight protein powder. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: This is David

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and value
customer_reviews.text: I don't like these as much as the cookie dough ones, but they're still better than most peanut butter flavored protein bars I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Jay_Cash

customer_reviews.title: Worst flavor by Powerbar
customer_reviews.text: The Cookies and Cream flavor is awful. The chocolate coating was skimpy and the cookie crumbles were stale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really like the chocolate peanut butter bars so I thought I would try these. Never again. They tasted horrible, and I love cookies and cream flavor. I knew it wouldn't taste like a cookies and cream candy bar, but I really had a hard time getting through these.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: These are an easy, tasty way to get a good dose of protein in with not too high of a calorie count. I often use these with a piece of fruit for an easy on-the-go lunch option. They are chocolatey, peanut buttery and not gritty or dry like a lot of protein type bars. I love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it at 6 something and thought it was a good deal. Took the risk and bought 3 packages. Tried it out today and damn, they taste so good!! (chocolate peanut butter). Wanted to buy more but checked the price again and it was at 25. Lucky me, it dropped to 6 something again.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Thinner Bar, More Expensive
customer_reviews.text: 9/1/20 Thinner bar, $6.00 more costly than last purchase six months ago. I’ll look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Protein
customer_reviews.text: Great power bars. My only complaint is that Amazon keeps changing the price by sometimes $12.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: These do not have a lot of sugar. Each bar is pretty high in protein which is great for me and my training.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Jo

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of expiration dates if you order, but great price and great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Although the bars are great and you can get them for a great price, be aware that the bars expire soon after the order date. For instance, the bars I received on January 6th expire on March 4th. I plan on eating them soon so it's not an issue for me, but would give me peace of mind if I had a little more time before they expire.
customer_reviews.author: Mister

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cause a lot of gas but they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: be-you-tiful

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting.  I take two of these each day to school with me.
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting. I take two of these each day to school with me, and I'm keeping my weight down.
customer_reviews.author: Jack London

customer_reviews.title: Filling
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? Peanut butter - good/ and they are quite filling as a meal replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: probably isnt healthy to use for calories, only for working out. but it does taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Don Power

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! Didn’t think it would taste this good since most protein bars I’ve tried have a chalky taste. However, this one doesn’t have that and the amount of bars for the price is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Not the best texture
customer_reviews.text: These bars are a bit chalky. I wasn’t thrilled with the texture. The flavor might be better if I wasn’t so turned off by how dry it is. I was a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, healthy protein!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the other bars I've tried have been jammed with sugars that resulted in a sugar crash. This bar serves up a great blend of protein and carbs that makes for a great tasting, protein filled snack.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: High protein, good taste
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, chocolate flavor and lowest calorie protein bar I’ve found for such a high amount of protein (about 200 calories for 20 grams of protein)...good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Flavor leaves much to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Bland, chalky flavor, but bearable if you just need protein during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Taste is good too.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great on these protein bars. I have ordered these twice. Others I have tried leaf to bad stomach issues and gas. These did not!
customer_reviews.author: InsideHippie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite protein bars. Taste great and filling.
customer_reviews.author: TONYA DELLINGER

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bars!
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars. They taste good and are great for some quick protein during work etc.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect texture and flavor
customer_reviews.text: The amount of protein in each bar 20 is good. Texture & flavor are great. Just wish the price would go down getting too expensive
customer_reviews.author: Nana-Wednesday

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: tastes great, only wish it had less sugar (12g). easy and quick protein snack.
customer_reviews.author: J.M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was good. I little chalky and crumbly but still good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Christensen

customer_reviews.title: I never expected that to happen but it does satisfy my sweet tooth fix
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS! I actually crave this bar over other chocolate candy bars. I never expected that to happen but it does satisfy my sweet tooth fix. And it feels good to eat right after workouts. My favorite 200 calorie protein bar by far
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: They discontinued the chocolate power bars I enjoyed. Tried these, yuk!
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Taste terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like them and neither did anyone else I tried to give them too.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: They tasted awesome. It stinks that I can no longer eat them because of a dairy alergy so no more chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not chewy
customer_reviews.text: I bought with good price, so it is okay. However, i don’t like taste and it isn’t chewy. It close to moist cookie...? If someone doesn’t like chewy stuff, then i recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Hunger Stopper
customer_reviews.text: These bars have nice flavor and really help to stave off hunger when stopping to have a sit down meal is not possible. Better than a candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: NOM NOM NOM
customer_reviews.text: Protein packed YUMMYNESS! Seriously: It's not chalky, has a great taste, lower in sugar than alternatives, and it gets delivered to my door. ::digital hi-five::
customer_reviews.author: Hobo

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Flavors is okay. But I hate the texture of the stuff in the inside.
customer_reviews.author: MKZ

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Box came all ratty but the bars weren’t melted and they were intact. Tastes just like peanut butter and chocolate m. I’ll order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy until Amazon lowers the price to $12.50 or less
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 15-count of Powerbars on Amazon for $12.50 back in July 2020. Please do not buy this product until Amazon lowers its price again. $20 to $30 is a ridiculous amount to pay for a product that doesn't taste very good, isn't terribly nutritious, and is only useful when you're desperate for some quick calories.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

Delivering high quality protein, a good source of fiber, and great taste in each bar, they are designed especially for everyday athletes, Enjoy the convenience of these grab and go bars to help replenish muscles and recover with ease post workout or as a snack any time of day

NO ARTIFICIAL Colors or Flavors, NO Trans Fat, GLUTEN FREE
